Please allow a couple seconds for the seedboxes to kick in, then it should move pretty quick. Hope it helps in your studies. Go for it! :D

Building on the tremendous success of their best-selling Economics, Brue, McConnell, and Flynn have revised their one-semester approach in Essentials of Economics, 3e to provide a fresh alternative for the survey course. The result is a patient, substantive treatment of micro and macro topics appropriate for the introductory economics student, and fully integrated in the digital environment to provide instant remediation and feedback through McGraw-HillÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s innovative assessment tool Connect Plus Economics.
